channel.title: Add IAM authentication for AWS RDS
channel.description:
I would love to see IAM auth support for RDS Postgres/Mysql DBs added ... I think this could leverage some of Elasticsearch auth implementation as it is somewhat similar. Anyone know if this is in someones pipeline?
Thanks! Peter
https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonRDS/latest/UserGuide/UsingWithRDS.IAMDBAuth.html

item.title: Add IAM authentication for AWS RDS
item.dc:creator: codezninja
item.description:
This feature would be great and help companies have better secure access to these types of resources.

Read full topic
item.source: Add IAM authentication for AWS RDS
